name: Going Nowhere
description:
IF YOU CANNOT PLAY THE GAME in Google Chrome, type this into the URL and enable it for Unity Web Player to run;
chrome://flags/#enable-npapi
If you are still having trouble, try running the game in a different browser.

After a hole in the road appears, you are stuck in a mysterious dream town. Discover the meaning of it all as you traverse the town and meet the strange inhabitants.

CONTROLS:
Jump: Space
Crouch: C
Sprint: Shift
Talk: E
Climb: Left Click
Pause: ESC or P
View the pause menu for more.

You can press R at the title screen to erase all data.
